description: Combine and display contents of multiple directories and files in Markdown format
config.maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size (in bytes) to process
config.directoryStructure.showFileExtens: Whether to show file extensions in the directory structure.
config.directoryStructure.useEmoji.descr: Use emoji icons in directory structure display
config.prefixText.description: Text to be added at the beginning of the generated Markdown.
config.useGitignore.description: Use patterns from .gitignore file to exclude files
config.useVscodeignore.description: Use patterns from .vscodeignore file to exclude files
config.enableStripTypes.description: Strip TypeScript-only syntax (types, interfaces, import type, as) before emitting content.
config.diff.mode.description: Select whether Git diff exports entire files or only functions/classes touching the diff.
config.diff.localContextLines.descriptio: Number of lines of surrounding context to keep when extracting diff-aware snippets (function mode).
config.gitDiff.range.description: Git revision range (e.g. 'origin/main..HEAD'). Empty for working tree changes.
matomeru.outputFormat.description: Output format for the generated document (markdown / yaml)
config.includeDependencies.description: Scan and include import/dependency statements for each file and generate a Mermaid graph in Markdown output.
config.mermaid.maxNodes.description: Maximum number of nodes to render in the Mermaid dependency graph. If exceeded, a warning will be shown.
config.yaml.includeContent.description: Include file content in YAML output. Disable for large projects to avoid memory issues.
